properties.Description: The properties of the StorSimple Manager.

location.Description: The geo location of the resource.

tags.Description: The tags attached to the resource.

cisIntrinsicSettings.Description: Represents the type of StorSimple Manager.

provisioningState.Description: Specifies the state of the resource as it is getting provisioned. Value of "Succeeded" means the Manager was successfully created.

name.Description: Refers to the sku name which should be "Standard"

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

version.Description: The version of the extended info being persisted.

integrityKey.Description: Represents the CIK of the resource.

encryptionKey.Description: Represents the CEK of the resource.

encryptionKeyThumbprint.Description: Represents the Cert thumbprint that was used to encrypt the CEK.

portalCertificateThumbprint.Description: Represents the portal thumbprint which can be used optionally to encrypt the entire data before storing it.

algorithm.Description: Represents the encryption algorithm used to encrypt the keys. None - if Key is saved in plain text format. Algorithm name - if key is encrypted

properties.Description: The properties of access control record.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

volumeCount.Description: The number of volumes using the access control record.

properties.Description: The properties of the bandwidth setting.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

volumeCount.Description: The number of volumes that uses the bandwidth setting.

start.Description: The start time of the schedule.

stop.Description: The stop time of the schedule.

days.Description: The days of the week when this schedule is applicable.

properties.Description: The properties of the alert notification settings.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

emailNotification.Description: Indicates whether email notification enabled or not.

notificationToServiceOwners.Description: The value indicating whether alert notification enabled for admin or not.

properties.Description: The properties of the time settings of a device.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

timeZone.Description: The timezone of device, like '(UTC -06:00) Central America'

primaryTimeServer.Description: The primary Network Time Protocol (NTP) server name, like 'time.windows.com'.

secondaryTimeServer.Description: The secondary Network Time Protocol (NTP) server name, like 'time.contoso.com'. It's optional.

properties.Description: The properties of the backup policy.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

volumeIds.Description: The path IDs of the volumes which are part of the backup policy.

nextBackupTime.Description: The time of the next backup for the backup policy.

lastBackupTime.Description: The time of the last backup for the backup policy.

schedulesCount.Description: The count of schedules the backup policy contains.

scheduledBackupStatus.Description: Indicates whether at least one of the schedules in the backup policy is active or not.

backupPolicyCreationType.Description: The backup policy creation type. Indicates whether this was created through SaaS or through StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

ssmHostName.Description: If the backup policy was created by StorSimple Snapshot Manager, then this field indicates the hostname of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

properties.Description: The properties of the backup schedule.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

backupType.Description: The type of backup which needs to be taken.

retentionCount.Description: The number of backups to be retained.

startTime.Description: The start time of the schedule.

lastSuccessfulRun.Description: The last successful backup run which was triggered for the schedule.

weeklyDaysList.Description: The week days list. Applicable only for schedules of recurrence type 'weekly'.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

encryptionKey.Description: The key used to encrypt data in the volume container. It is required when property 'EncryptionStatus' is "Enabled".

encryptionStatus.Description: The flag to denote whether encryption is enabled or not.

volumeCount.Description: The number of volumes in the volume Container.

storageAccountCredentialId.Description: The path ID of storage account associated with the volume container.

ownerShipStatus.Description: The owner ship status of the volume container. Only when the status is "NotOwned", the delete operation on the volume container is permitted.

bandWidthRateInMbps.Description: The bandwidth-rate set on the volume container.

bandwidthSettingId.Description: The ID of the bandwidth setting associated with the volume container.

totalCloudStorageUsageInBytes.Description: The total cloud storage for the volume container.

encryptionCertThumbprint.Description: Thumbprint certificate that was used to encrypt "Value". If the value in unencrypted, it will be null.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

sizeInBytes.Description: The size of the volume in bytes.

volumeContainerId.Description: The ID of the volume container, in which this volume is created.

accessControlRecordIds.Description: The IDs of the access control records, associated with the volume.

operationStatus.Description: The operation status on the volume.

backupStatus.Description: The backup status of the volume.

monitoringStatus.Description: The monitoring status of the volume.

backupPolicyIds.Description: The IDs of the backup policies, in which this volume is part of.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

sslStatus.Description: Signifies whether SSL needs to be enabled or not.

accessKey.Description: The details of the storage account password.

volumesCount.Description: The count of volumes using this storage account credential.

emailList.Description: The list of email IDs to send the test alert email

volumeContainers.Description: The list of meta data of volume containers, which are part of the failover set.

eligibilityResult.Description: The eligibility result of the failover set, for failover.

volumeContainerId.Description: The path ID of the volume container.

volumes.Description: The list of metadata of volumes inside the volume container, which contains valid cloud snapshots.

volumeId.Description: The path ID of the volume.

sizeInBytes.Description: The size of the volume in bytes at the time the snapshot was taken.

backupCreatedDate.Description: The date at which the snapshot was taken.

backupElementId.Description: The path ID of the backup-element for this volume, inside the backup set.

backupId.Description: The path ID of the backup set.

backupPolicyId.Description: The path ID of the backup policy using which the snapshot was taken.

isEligibleForFailover.Description: Represents if this failover set is eligible for failover or not.

errorMessage.Description: The error message, if the failover set is not eligible for failover.

targetDeviceId.Description: The ARM path ID of the device which will act as the failover target.

volumeContainers.Description: The list of path IDs of the volume containers which needs to be failed-over to the target device.
The list of path IDs of the volume containers that needs to be failed-over, for which we want to fetch the eligible targets.

value.Description: The list of all the failover targets.

deviceId.Description: The path ID of the device.

modelDescription.Description: The model number of the device.

deviceSoftwareVersion.Description: The software version of the device.

dataContainersCount.Description: The count of data containers on the device.

volumesCount.Description: The count of volumes on the device.

availableLocalStorageInBytes.Description: The amount of free local storage available on the device in bytes.

availableTieredStorageInBytes.Description: The amount of free tiered storage available for the device in bytes.

deviceLocation.Description: The geo location (applicable only for cloud appliances) of the device.

friendlyDeviceSoftwareVersion.Description: The friendly name for the current version of software on the device.

eligibilityResult.Description: The eligibility result of the device, as a failover target device.

eligibilityStatus.Description: The eligibility status of device, as a failover target device.

messages.Description: The list of error messages, if a device does not qualify as a failover target device.

message.Description: The localized error message stating the reason why the device is not eligible as a target device.

resolution.Description: The localized resolution message for the error.

resultCode.Description: The result code for the error, due to which the device does not qualify as a failover target device.

activationKey.Description: The activation key for the device.

value.Description: The value of the secret itself. If the secret is in plaintext or null then EncryptionAlgorithm will be none.

valueCertificateThumbprint.Description: The thumbprint of the cert that was used to encrypt "Value".

encryptionAlgorithm.Description: The algorithm used to encrypt the "Value".

resolutionMessage.Description: The resolution message while clearing the alert

alerts.Description: The list of alert IDs to be cleared

vnetName.Description: The name of the virtual network.

isVnetDnsConfigured.Description: Indicates whether virtual network used is configured with DNS or not.

isVnetExpressConfigured.Description: Indicates whether virtual network used is configured with express route or not.

storageAccountName.Description: The name of the storage account.

storageAccountType.Description: The type of the storage account.

vmType.Description: The type of the virtual machine.

vmImageName.Description: The name of the virtual machine image.

properties.Description: The properties of the configure device request.

id.Description: The path ID that uniquely identifies the object.

type.Description: The hierarchical type of the object.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

friendlyName.Description: The friendly name for the device.

currentDeviceName.Description: The current name of the device.

timeZone.Description: The device time zone. For eg: "Pacific Standard Time"

dnsSettings.Description: The secondary DNS Settings of the device.

secondaryDnsServers.Description: The list of secondary DNS Server IP addresses.

targetDeviceId.Description: The path ID of the device which will act as the clone target.

targetVolumeName.Description: The name of the new volume which will be created and the backup will be cloned into.

targetAccessControlRecordIds.Description: The list of path IDs of the access control records to be associated to the new cloned volume.

backupElement.Description: The backup element that is cloned.

elementId.Description: The path ID that uniquely identifies the backup element.

elementName.Description: The name of the backup element.

elementType.Description: The hierarchical type of the backup element.

volumeContainerId.Description: The path ID of the volume container.

properties.Description: The properties of the controller power state change request.

id.Description: The path ID that uniquely identifies the object.

type.Description: The hierarchical type of the object.

kind.Description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

action.Description: The power state that the request is expecting for the controller of the device.

activeController.Description: The active controller that the request is expecting on the device.

controller0State.Description: The controller 0's status that the request is expecting on the device.

controller1State.Description: The controller 1's status that the request is expecting on the device.
